main.title: Chose the Best Social Media UI Design in Your Mind!
main.t:
If you had Elon Musk Money,
And you suddenly want to buy
YouTube, FaceBook, Instagram and Dcard,
whitch is the four most commonly used social media in Taiwan,
Then put them all together
and make a social media that is just for you!
main.t1: Thank you for taking the time to take this fun quiz!
main.t2:
Next, you will pass a few simple quizzes to determine
what the best-looking social media style
looks like in your mind.
At the same time,
these data will be returned to our database
to help us calculate
the most popular social media styles in Taiwan in 2022

about-us.title: About Us
about-us.t:
TP young was founded in October 2022. It is led by two students of Taipei University's digital marketing program and is dedicated to researching communities, marketing and the Internet.

Although in this In severe times, every young person under economic pressure is out of breath, causing everyone to want to lie flat, but besides lying flat, we also want to do something to prove ourselves, make a modest contribution to society, and Leave our footprints online.

Our mission is to make a small difference in the world because of us.

component.t:
In this study, we divided the interface into five different components:
The title bar, the function bar, the dynamic bar, the content and the navigation bar.

You can combine them yourself The positions and styles of these five components,
You can also close or pin them!
component.t2: [In the picture above, I hide the function column, drag the time-limited dynamic column to the second row and pin it, and keep the others unchanged.]

fixed.t:
Pin a component, and it will be at the top or bottom of your screen,
and will not scroll with the content.
You can think of pin selection as Excel's freeze first column function. 

Usually the title bar, function bar and navigation bar are pinned,
Of course you can also create your own design!
fixed.t2: [In the figure above, the top title bar and the bottom navigation bar are pinned and will not scroll with the content scrolling.]

title.t: Contains title and some function buttons.
title.t2: [Pinned components will not move as content moves up or down]

function.t2:
The function bar is also pinned.
It should be noted that Instagram itself does not have a function bar,
but you can still apply the function bar of other social media!

short.t2: Dcard does not have a native timed feed column, you can choose to use other social media's timed feed list.

content.t: Contains the content of this app.

nav.t: Contains some buttons to help user go to the page whitch thay want to go.

lot.t3: But you have no clear preferred design!
lot.t4: You are a very rich person!

share.t: Share this Test To Your Friend!

p3.q1: To Which social media do you use most often?
p3.q2: this step will set the default UI at this survey.

p4.q1: Drag and Drop to Chose the perfect position of all Components.
p4.q2: Real-Time Change will show at the right side.
